title: That Metal Show S10E08 HDTV 1080i (Vinnie Paul, Styx)
description:
Episodes of That Metal Show are finally being broadcast in HD on the Palladia channel.  Here is season 10 episode 8.  The guests are Tommy Shaw, James Young (Styx) and Vinnie Paul (Pantera, Damageplan, Hellyeah) with guest guitarist Steve Stevens (Billy Idol, Bozzio Levin Stevens).

This video was captured directly from a digital cable box's HDMI output to MPEG4 in 1080i using a Game Capture HD and an HDMI splitter to remove HDCP.  Since it was captured from cable, it is interlaced, and no re-encoding has been performed.  If you are playing back on a computer, please enable de-interlacing on your media player.  See below for complete technical specs on the video.
